Authors:
Hai Feng Liu, Jing Liao, Xiao Yu Chen, Quan Ke Liu, Zhi He
Yu, Jian Xin Deng
Title:
A novel species and a new record of Alternaria isolated from
two Solanaceae plants in China
Abstract:
Two Alternaria species were isolated from two Solanaceae
plants in China, 2017. One species from Solanum tuberosum was identified
as Alternaria blumeae and another from Physalis alkekengi was described
as a new species. Both were determined based on morphological
characteristics and multi‒gene sequence analysis of ITS, EF-1ɑ, GAPDH,
Alt a 1 and RPB2. A. blumeae is firstly reported from S. tuberosum
worldwide and also a new record in China. The new species were described
and illustrated here, as Alternaria physalidis sp. nov.. It is clearly
distinct from the most similar species, A. zinniae in the conidial body
length and septate number.
